EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202305-HHS-ENT-AONL-CONF.00c. Invite 1_Series#2
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us to discover the power of inpatient virtual nursing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Learn how virtual nursing is transforming inpatient care AONL 2023
May 1-4
Anaheim Convention Center Inpatient virtual nursing has arrived. One midsize health system reported it reduced the time of its discharge process by 20% by transferring some responsibilities from bedside to virtual nurses. If you or a colleague are attending AONL 2023 Annual Conference, let’s connect. • Meet us at Booth #467 <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/aonl-2023?month=2023-05]]> to learn how our virtual nursing solution is addressing staff challenges while increasing nurse satisfaction • Learn from our partners—including Providence, Saint Luke’s Health System and Trinity Health— on May 3 at 7 a.m. PT to hear how they’ve successfully implemented virtual nursing programs • Get a head start on the conversation by exploring these resources <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/virtual-nursing/]]> About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
